00001 /**************************************************************************/
00018 #ifndef _ZGPNVMTABLE_H
00019 #define _ZGPNVMTABLE_H
00020 
00021 #ifdef _GREENPOWER_SUPPORT_
00022 /******************************************************************************
00023                     Includes section
00024 ******************************************************************************/
00025 #include <wlPdsMemIds.h>
00026 #include <zgpLow.h>
00027 #include <zgpLowNvmTable.h>
00028 
00029 /******************************************************************************
00030                     Defines
00031 ******************************************************************************/
00032 /* ZGP table S_Nv item layout(256 items)
00033    16 items reserved for mapping table banks
00034    120 items reserved for table entries(4 entries in one item)
00035    120 items reserved for table entry framecounter(4 security frame counters in one item)
00036 */
00037 #define ZGP_MAX_ENTRIES_COUNT                     240
00038 #define ZGP_MAX_MAPPING_TABLE_BANKS               16
00039 #define ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_FIRST_BANK_ITEM_ID      ZGP_TABLE_STARTING_ITEM_ID
00040 #define ZGP_ENTRY_STARTING_ITEM_ID                (ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_FIRST_BANK_ITEM_ID + ZGP_MAX_MAPPING_TABLE_BANKS)
00041 #define ZGP_ENTRY_LAST_ITEM_ID                    (ZGP_ENTRY_STARTING_ITEM_ID + ZGP_MAX_ENTRIES_COUNT - 2)
00042 /* last item id is reserved for NVM table header item having table size, bank size and version info */
00043 #define ZGP_NVM_TABLE_HEADER_ITEM_ID              (ZGP_ENTRY_STARTING_ITEM_ID + ZGP_MAX_ENTRIES_COUNT - 1)
00044 #define ZGP_TABLE_ENTRIES_PER_ITEM                4
00045 #define ZGP_DEF_MAPPING_TABLE_ENTRIES_PER_BANK   16
00046 #ifndef ZGP_MAX_NVM_ENTRIES
00047 #define ZGP_MAX_NVM_ENTRIES                       64
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #if APP_ZGP_DEVICE_TYPE == APP_ZGP_DEVICE_TYPE_COMBO_BASIC
00051 #define SINK_TABLE_SIZE  ZGP_SINK_TABLE_SIZE
00052 #else
00053 #define SINK_TABLE_SIZE  0
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #if (SINK_TABLE_SIZE + ZGP_PROXY_TABLE_SIZE) > ZGP_MAX_NVM_ENTRIES
00057 #error configured table size(proxy & sink) is more than ZGP_MAX_NVM_ENTRIES
00058 #else
00059 #define ZGP_MAX_TABLE_ENTRIES  (SINK_TABLE_SIZE + ZGP_PROXY_TABLE_SIZE)
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 // By default keeping the bank size as 16 for easy backward compatibility handling
00063 #define ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_SIZE   ZGP_DEF_MAPPING_TABLE_ENTRIES_PER_BANK
00064 
00065 #define ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_COUNT    ((ZGP_MAX_TABLE_ENTRIES / ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_SIZE) + \
00066                                          ((ZGP_MAX_TABLE_ENTRIES % ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_SIZE)? 1:0))
00067 #define ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_INFO_MASK_SIZE (ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_COUNT/8 + \
00068                                           (ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_BANK_COUNT % 8 ? 1 : 0))
00069 /******************************************************************************
00070                     Types section
00071 ******************************************************************************/
00072 BEGIN_PACK
00073 typedef enum PACK _ZgpNvmOperationType_t
00074 {
00075   NVM_WRITE = 0x1,
00076   NVM_DELETE = 0x2,
00077   NVM_READ = 0x3
00078 } zgpNvmOperationType_t;
00079 
00080 typedef enum PACK _ZgpNvmOperationBitMask_t
00081 {
00082   ENTRY_OPERATION = (1 << 0),
00083   SECURITY_FRAMECOUNTER_OPERATION = (1 << 1),
00084 } zgpNvmOperationFieldBitMask_t;
00085 
00086 typedef enum PACK _ZgpMappingTableStatus_t
00087 {
00088   ZGP_FREE_ENTRY_AVAILABLE = 0x0,
00089   ZGP_PROXY_ENTRY_PRESENT = 0x1,
00090   ZGP_SINK_ENTRY_PRESENT = 0x2,
00091   ZGP_STATUS_MAX_INDEX
00092 } zgpMappingTableStatus_t;
00093 
00094 typedef struct PACK _ZgpNvmTableHeader_t
00095 {
00096   uint16_t version;
00097   uint8_t proxyTableSize;
00098   uint8_t sinkTableSize;
00099   uint8_t noOfBanks;
00100   uint8_t bankSize;
00101   uint8_t reserved[6];
00102 } zgpNvmTableHeader_t;
00103 
00104 typedef struct PACK _ZgpBankInfo_t
00105 {
00106   uint8_t cachedBankNo;
00107   uint8_t noOfProxyTableEntries;
00108   // Specific to GPDs alone
00109   uint8_t noOfPhysicalSinkTableEntries;
00110   // Specific to GPD's communication mode
00111   uint8_t noOfLogicalSinkTableEntries;
00112   uint8_t bankStatus[ZGP_STATUS_MAX_INDEX][ZGP_MAPPING_TABLE_INFO_MASK_SIZE];
00113 } zgpBankInfo_t;
00114 
00115 END_PACK
00116 
00117 typedef struct _zgpEntryFilterField_t
00118 {
00119   uint16_t appId :2;
00120   uint16_t tableType :2;
00121   uint16_t commModeMask :4;
00122   // Reserved bits for future enhancment
00123   uint16_t reserved :8;
00124 } zgpEntryFilterField_t;
00125 
00126 typedef struct _ZgpMappingTable_t
00127 {
00128   zgpEntryFilterField_t filterField;
00129   ZGP_GpdId_t gpdId;
00130   uint8_t endPoint;
00131 } zgpMappingTable_t;
00132 
00133 typedef struct _ZgpEntryNvmFormat_t
00134 {
00135   ZGP_TableType_t tableType;
00136   union
00137   {
00138     ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t proxyEntry;
00139     ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t sinkEntry;
00140   } tableEntry;
00141 } zgpEntryNvmFormat_t;
